testcase.name: Rewardbased Video
testcase.summary: Check Rewardbased video should recevied the coins in logs , when we play a full ad.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Lets complete the video.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Lets complete the video.

4. Observe the received coins in logs.
step.expectedresults: Rewardbased video should recevied the coins in logs , when we play a full ad.

testcase.name: Play Ad Video
testcase.summary: Video should play
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.
  2. Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Tap on Play button.
step.expectedresults: Ad video should play.

testcase.name: Progress bar
testcase.summary: Check Progress bar must show on video
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.
  2. Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Check the progress bar on video
step.expectedresults: Progress bar should be displayed on video

testcase.name: CTA button position
testcase.summary: Check CTA button position on Video
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app
  2. Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Check the CTA Download button lower left corner on video.
step.expectedresults: CTA download button on video should be visible on lower left corner of screen

testcase.name: CTA behavior
testcase.summary: Check CTA button behavior on Video
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Check the CTA Button on video.

4. Tap on CTA Button.
step.expectedresults: CTA download button on video should open link in browser/playstore.

testcase.name: Close Button

1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Check the close button on video.
step.expectedresults: Check Close button on video should be visible

step.actions:

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Check the close button on video.

4. Tap on close button.

  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Check the close button on video.

4. Tap on close button.
step.expectedresults: Tap on Close button on video should close the Ad video Experiance.

testcase.name: Notification
testcase.summary:
• Play video, swipe down notifications, a video should pause. Swipe back notifications video should resume.
  • Again,Play video, swipe down notifications, a video should pause. Swipe back notifications video should resume.
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Swipe down/Up notification bar on video.
step.expectedresults:
• Play video, swipe down notifications, a video should pause. Swipe back notifications video should resume.
  • Again,Play video, swipe down notifications, a video should pause. Swipe back notifications video should resume.

testcase.name: Application Behaviour when send app to background and foreground
testcase.summary: Send app to background and foreground - Audio should sync with video
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Send app to background and forground.
step.expectedresults: Send app to background and foreground - Audio should sync with video

testcase.name: Device Lock Screen
testcase.summary: When the device's lock screen is set to none,play video, lock the device,unlock the device again,the video should resume after the device is unlocked
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Perform device lock/unlock opration on video.
step.expectedresults: When the device's lock screen is set to none,play video, lock the device,unlock the device again,the video should resume after the device is unlocked

User agent must be

i.e:- Vungle/4.0.9;adobeAir/3_0_7
testcase.preconditions:

  2. Tap on Play button.
  3. Check the User Agent of the build on charles.
step.expectedresults:
User agent must be

i.e-Vungle/4.0.9;adobeAir/3_0_7

testcase.name: Tap on close button on video Ad when incentivized Option is enable .
testcase.summary:
Incentivized ad-Tap on close.

The SDK should prompt you to close the Ad or continue watching
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
  2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.
  3. Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.
  4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults: Video should pause and incentivized popup box should appear on video Ad.

testcase.name: Incentivized popup apper on video
testcase.summary: Check When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button
step.expectedresults: Video should pause and incentivized dialog box should apper on video.

testcase.name: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close/continue button.
testcase.summary: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close, The Ad should be closed otherwise it should resume
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Tap on Play button

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.

4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults:
The Ad should be closed otherwise it should resume

  • If User tap on close button then Ad Experience should close
  • If User tap on continue button then Ad experience should resume

testcase.name: Check when Incentivized popup apper on video
testcase.summary: When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page

3. Tap on Play add button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button
step.expectedresults: When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause. Tap anywhere on screen. Ad should not be resumed.

testcase.name: Landscape Orientation
testcase.summary: Check video in landscape mode (only for legacy not applicable for Mraid)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on landscape option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

testcase.name: Tap on close button on video Ad when incentivized Option is enable .
testcase.summary:
Incentivized ad-Tap on close.

The SDK should prompt you to close the Ad or continue watching
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
  2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.
  3. Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.
  4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults: Video should pause and incentivized popup box should appear on video Ad.

testcase.name: Incentivized popup apper on video
testcase.summary: Check When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button
step.expectedresults: Video should pause and incentivized dialog box should apper on video.

testcase.name: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close/continue button.
testcase.summary: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close, The Ad should be closed otherwise it should resume
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Tap on Play button

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.

4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults:
The Ad should be closed otherwise it should resume

  • If User tap on close button then Ad Experience should close
  • If User tap on continue button then Ad experience should resume

step.actions:

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.expectedresults: When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause. Tap anywhere on screen. Ad should not be resumed.

2. Tap on Play button.
3. Lets complete the video.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Lets complete the video.

4. Observe the 'Download Button' on end card.

5. Click on Download Button.
step.expectedresults: Download button on endcard should be clickable

testcase.name: Enable Incentivized
testcase.summary: Incentivized Ad should play

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Tap on Play button.
step.expectedresults: Video should play normally

2. Tap on Play button.

testcase.name: Tap on close button on video Ad when incentivized Option is enable .
testcase.summary:
Incentivized ad-Tap on close.

The SDK should prompt you to close the Ad or continue watching
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
  2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.
  3. Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.
  4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults: Video should pause and incentivized popup box should appear on video Ad.

testcase.name: Incentivized popup apper on video
testcase.summary: Check When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button
step.expectedresults: Video should pause and incentivized dialog box should apper on video.

testcase.name: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close/continue button.
testcase.summary: Incentivized ad- If you tap on close, The Ad should be closed otherwise it should resume
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Tap on Play button

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button.

4. Incentivized dialog box apper click close / continue button on dialog box.
step.expectedresults:
• If User tap on close button then Ad Experience should close
  • If User tap on continue button then Ad experience should resume

testcase.name: Check when Incentivized popup apper on video
testcase.summary: When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page

3. Tap on Play add button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on incentivized option from option menu page.

3.Play the video and after 5 sec click on close button
step.expectedresults: When Incentivized pop up appear as on screen,ad should pause. Tap anywhere on screen. Ad should not be resumed.

testcase.name: Landscape Orientation
testcase.summary: Check video in landscape mode (only for legacy not applicable for Mraid)

1. Initialize the app.

2. Turn on landscape option from option menu page.

step.actions:

2. Turn on landscape option from option menu page.

3.And play the video.
step.expectedresults: Video should play in landscape mode for legacy Ad

testcase.name: CTA button position

  2. Tap on Play button.

testcase.name: Notification
testcase.summary: Play video, swipe down notifications, video should pause. Swipe back notifications video should resume.Play video, swipe down notifications, video should pause.
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Swipe down/Up notification bar on video.
step.expectedresults: Play video, swipe down notifications, video should pause. Swipe back notifications video should resume.Play video, swipe down notifications, video should pause.

testcase.name: Application Behaviour when send app to background and foreground
testcase.summary: Send app to background and foreground - Audio should sync with video
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Send app to background and forground.
step.expectedresults: Send app to background and foreground - Audio should sync with video

testcase.name: Device Lock Screen
testcase.summary: When the device's lock screen is set to none,play video, lock the device,unlock the device again,the video should resume after the device is unlocked.
testcase.preconditions:
1.  Initialize the app
  2.  Tap on Play button.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2. Tap on Play button.

3. Perform device lock/unlock opration on video.
step.expectedresults: When the device's lock screen is set to none,play video, lock the device,unlock the device again,the video should resume after the device is unlocked.
